content:
Cloud Native Wasm Day EU 2024 is once again co-located with Kubecon 2024. Taking place in Paris, France on March 19, 2024, our CFP is still open:

https://events.linuxfoundation.org/kubecon-cloudnativecon-europe/co-located-events/cloud-native-wasm-day/

If you have any questions, or would like some assistance, please don't hesitate to reach out.

Cloud Native Wasm Day | LF Events
Cloud Native WebAssembly Day highlights the growing importance and ubiquity of WebAssembly throughout the cloud-native ecosystem. As an application host, an application pluginâ€¦
